result.text: A ruined shrine hides in the forest.
Bandits follow an old logging road.
A ranger saw lights near the marsh.
Travelers vanished on the north path.
A relic is said to rest in a vine-wrapped ruin.
Druids mark trees to ward spirits.
A merchant lost a pack mule in the hills.
Wolves gather under a pale moon.
Old roads sink into a mire near the river.
A hermit trades secrets for food.
